name: Color Chain
description: Color Chain is a small casual tile-matching video game.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Pentium D 830 (2* 3000) or equivalent / AMD Athlon 64 4000+ (2600) or equivalent Memory: 500 MB RAM Graphics: GeForce 7600 GS (256 MB) / Radeon HD 2400 PRO (256 MB) Storage: 50 MB available space
